txt.en: 'Would you look at that?!'
'Heed my words well, Worm!'
'Blood need not be spilled this day.'
'I, Váskmun Greytooth, claim my right to the Dwarf-ring, Manthríf!'
'You fool!'
'Silence, Worm! What have you done with it?'
'What did you think you would find here?'
'Hah! I was worried I would have to cut it from your belly, Worm.'
'Ah! What a feast!'
'But I...I-I do not see it.'
'To think that little fool still believes his Ring is down here...'
'Perhaps the Eye had plans for them, but all for naught it seems.'
'Ulur ilzu-ûr, drû-glob!'
'Lower your weapons!'
'For years, I endured the tortures of the Weeping Warrior in these depths...'
'...and through vile sorcery, Sauron corrupted my body into this cruel form.'
'I could not bear it any longer, and my mind became as Sauron's.'
'I betrayed Gil-galad! I scorned the Valar!'
'But now, it is undone! I am...Thelaron of Lindon!'
'Alas, I am no Elf. Though my spirit is healed, naught but the light of the Blessed Realm shall heal my body...'
'...and that is forbidden to me now.'
'Ah, the one who freed the Dwarf-king....how fortunate!'
'For what you have done, I will leave you in peace. These sorrowful depths are my home no longer.'
'We of the Order shall have our vengeance!'
'Press on, if you must, but beware the Greed that has drawn so many into the Mordath!'
'Sauron shall be reborn in blood!'
'No! What trickery is this?!'
'No! Away with you!'
'It's not the Order we should be worried about now....'
'This lot's broken through! The Order's either dead or scattered!'
'I was wrought by the will of Morgoth!'
'I have witnessed the wrath of Ancalagon the Black!'
'I survived the fall of Angband! The drowning of Thangorodrim!'
'You are nothing before me...'
'Nothing...'
'Nothing...'
'The Eye is cast upon you!'
'Obey!'
The Abyss of Mordath
'Run, you miserable pests!'
'There is nowhere to hide!'
'Die in flames!'
'Burn!'
'Let the stones of this prison shake to their foundations!'
'The voice...so far off...but so clear!'
'It tells me the bridge must be repaired...the Lithannon opened....'
'The Master of the Pit must be freed....'
'All the riches of this land and those beyond shall be mine, [placeholder]! By Manthríf, I swear it!'
'As the High Priest and High Priestess foretold, they have come!'
'Defend the Order! Lady Abrazaphel has plans for them!'
'Right then! I'm back in charge now!'
'Durshnúl shall be your doom! Begone!'
'Enough! I'll handle this!'
'You might have gotten topsides on that one, but you won't get me!'
'Betrayers! Thieves! Curse you! Curse you all!'
'Where now is Gimli? Was he so blind as you?'
'I care not for the power of the Ring. Manthríf is an heirloom of my forefathers! It is mine by right!'
'You have brought tragedy upon my people, and I shall see it repaid!'
'I cannot explain it, King Greytooth.'
'Since we arrived in this pit, the Worm has made no attempt to attack us. It hasn't put even the slightest strain on its chains!'
'It seems to me the fires in its belly were extinguished long ago by Sauron, and it must have become far too frail to break free.'
'Such things are not for your eyes!'
'But look yonder, my King! Can you believe it?'
'Silence!'
'All the spoils of the Dark Lord left with an old, half-blind Worm! Hah!'
'Your will is mine!'
'It is ours for the taking, King Greytooth! What need have we now for the Ri--'
You must have completed 'Discovery: Abyss of Mordath' to play this instance.
'The bridge needs to be repaired! Kill that lot, and get back to work!'
'The Valar have blinded you!'
'You are not worthy to stand before me!'
'Cower, fools!'
'Stop this!'
'My spear strikes true!'
'Deceivers! I will not hear your lies!'
'Sauron's will must be done!'
'I will not spend another Age in this pit!'
'I...will...be...FREE!'
'THAT is your name for Sindya? Such a crude tongue you dwarves have....'
'As I devoured them, even the curses of the Elves sang with beauty!'
'Patience, little dwarf.'
'It is here...and ringed about one of my teeth.'
'Ah, but do you see these chains, Dwarf-king?'
'If the Ring is truly what you want, come forth! It is yours to take.'
'You fool!'
'That \qlittle fool\q and his dwarves slew over thirty of our number. Do not forget that.'
'Ah...at last!'
'What are these...things? I have not seen anything like them before!'
'As for the rest of you miserable dwarves...BURN!'
'For an Age, I served the will of Sauron the Great.'
'I think not. There may be a use for them yet...'
'I smell you, wretches! Show yourselves!'
'For He alone perceived the deceptions of the Valar and sought to bring harmony to this realm.'
'Ah, what is this? Have you come seeking the Rings? To pillage my hoards?'
'Twice the frail minds of Men and Elves have led them to defy the Lord of the Rings, and in so doing, they worked their own ruin.'
'Come, then. Let us see if you can!'
'With Sauron banished, the corruption of the Valar shall engulf and diminish this world.'
'I shall not let His will be undone...'
'Hah! The King thought you might follow us down here!'
'But you're too late! We know where Manthríf lies!'
'Stop them! They must not reach the King!'
